sentences.sContent: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.sCn: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.sContent: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.sCn: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

sentences.sContent: ...the government must provide wage subsidies to compensate for lost pay due to the shorter hours...
...To compensate for the fast-shrinking labour force...

exam.question: To ______ for his unpleasant experiences he drank a little more than was good for him.

answer.explain: compensate for sb./sth.： 弥补， 补偿。句意： 为了弥补他这段不愉快的经历， 他多喝了一点。commence： 开始； compro-mise： 妥协， 折中； compliment： 赞扬。

exam.question: We’ll ______ you for any damage done to your house while we are in it.

answer.explain: 句意： 我们居住期间对房屋造成的任何损坏， 我们都会向你赔偿。 remedy： 治疗， 补救； supplement： 补充； retrieve： 重新得到。

remMethod.val: com(全部) ＋ pens(花费) ＋ ate(做) → 支付所有花费 → 补偿

words.tran: 可补偿的；应予以补偿的

trans.tranOther: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage
